name: Cranknstein II
description:
1818, Ingolstadt, Germany.

Cranknstein is the result of several scientific experiments made by Dr. V. Cranknstein trying to create a sapient creature. Repulsed by his work and furious about the creature not being able to solve the easiest puzzles - and not even did the crank work at all -, Dr. Cranknstein locked him up in his laboratory and left the scene forever.

As his feelings are understandably hurt, Cranknstein tries to escape from the laboratory to take his revenge on mankind...

Unfortunately Cranknstein has not managed to escape from the place for the last 204 years, so now it is your task to help him flee from his prison and thus fullfill his plans!

  • Puzzle-escape-game
  • 50 levels of brainteasing fun
  • hints and checkpoints
  • secrets to unlock
  • ORIGINAL SCORE BY FLOPPY

I hope you have fun with my game made with pulp :)
